SELECT enterprise_user.`name` as name,job_title,job_description,company_name,city,`status`,submission_time,approval_time,rejection_reason,recruit_num,recruited_num,byword,job_duties,min_salary,max_salary FROM recruitment_info,enterprise_user,department WHERE enterprise_user.user_id=#{userId} AND department.enterprise_id=enterprise_user.enterprise_id AND department.name=#{departmentName} AND recruitment_info.department_id=department.department_id AND recruitment_info.enterprise_id=department.enterprise_id
AND recruitment_info.status=2
AND recruitment_info.status=3
AND (recruitment_info.status=2 OR recruitment_info.status=3)
AND recruitment_info.status=1
AND (recruitment_info.status=1 OR recruitment_info.status=2)
AND (recruitment_info.status=1 OR recruitment_info.status=2)
AND (recruitment_info.status=1 OR recruitment_info.status=2 OR recruitment_info.status=3)
AND recruitment_info.city=#{city}
AND recruitment_info.max_salary>=#{maxSalary}
